item.description:
Products go-yugioh Go library for accessing the Yu-Gi-Oh! API by YGOPRODeck. import ( "fmt" "github.com/Doarakko/go-yugioh/yugioh" ) func main() { client := yugioh.NewClient() cards, _, _ := client.Cards.List( &yugioh.CardsListOptions{ KeyWord: "dragon", Type: "Fusion Monster", Attribute: "light"}) for _, card := range cards { fmt.Printf("Name: %v
Type: %v
Race: %v
Description:
%v

", card.Name, card.Type, card.Race, card.Description) } } Name: A-to-Z-Dragon Buster Cannon Type: Fusion Monster Race: Machine Description: "ABC-Dragon Buster" + "XYZ-Dragon Cannon" Must be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by banishing cards you control with the above original names, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways.
